entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:23 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 02:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: SSW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20 except minus 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 except minus 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 02:09 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 02:09 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 02:09 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
